description: i tuyn VN ch ang  pha trc! Ti tin Vit Nam s v ch v lm nn lch s.  Ho nhp vi bu khng kh si sng sc khi i tuyn U23 Vit Nam vo bn kt chu  v th hin li cm n ti HLV Park Hang Seo, Hoco Studio chnh thc ra mt ng dng hc ting Hn c bn trn h iu hnh Android siu n gin v siu hiu qu. Mt iu c bit  l Hoco Studio s  n hon ton MIN PH t ngy hm nay cho n ht thng ny (thng 1/2018).  Nu bn dng iOS? khng sao hy chia s ng dng ny cho bn thi cp 1, cp 2, cp 3, i hc v.v..  ng dng ny s gip cho nhng ngi mun i du lch Hn Quc, nhng ngi mun tm hiu thm v vn ho HQ, nhng ngi ang hc ting HQ hay c nhng ngi ang lm vic - cng tc ti HQ. Ngoi ra, n s gip mi quan h Vit Hn ngy cng khng kht hn, mnh tin l nh th.  Nu c ai gp ng Park Hang Seo cho mnh gi li cm n n ng y : )  Xin chn thnh cm n.  P/s: D n ang c min ph nhng nu bn mun ng h th vn c th thc hin bng cch vo mc ng H khi vut t bn tri sang.  *H tr h iu hnh:  Android 4.0  Ice cream Sandwich Android 4.1  Jelly Bean Android 4.4  Kitkat Android 5.0  Lollipop Android 6.0  Marshmallow Android 7.0  Nougat Android 8.0  Oreo Android 9.0  Pie Android 10.0  Q (2020) The target Vietnam team is ahead! I believe Vietnam will win and make history.  In harmony with the exciting atmosphere when the U23 team of Vietnam reached the Asian semi-finals and expressed thanks to Coach Park Hang Seo, Hoco Studio officially launched the application learn basic Korean on the operating system. Android operating system super simple and super efficient. One special thing is that Hoco Studio will leave it completely FREE from today until the end of this month (January 2018). If you use iOS? Its okay to share this app for your elementary, middle, high school, university, etc.  This app will help those who want to travel to Korea, who want to learn more about Korean culture, those who are learning Korean or who are working - working in Korea. In addition, it will help Vietnam-Korea relations become more and more close, I believe.  If anyone sees Mr. Park Hang Seo, I would like to thank him:)  Sincerely thank.  P / s: Although it is free but if you want to support it can still be done by going to the Support section when swiping from the left.  * Operating system support:  Android 4.0 - Ice cream Sandwich Android 4.1 - Jelly Bean Android 4.4 - Kitkat Android 5.0 - Lollipop Android 6.0 - Marshmallow Android 7.0 - Nougat Android 8.0 - Oreo Android 9.0 - Pie Android 10.0 - Q (2020)
